Home.Bio.Title: Bio
Home.Bio.Content: Everything from a maker, an electrician, a designer to a developer, I'm a jack of all trades but a master of none. I was born and raised in Hanoi, Vietnam, and am currently studying in Mikkeli, Finland. With a passion for building fascinating applications, I've always been eager to explore the cutting edge of technology. When not working, I often hang out on Github and LinkedIn to learn, socialize, or get inspired.
Home.Timeline.Title: My life
Home.Timeline.Content.02.Description: Where all hopes and dreams began.
Home.Timeline.Content.14: Wrote my first line of code on my sister's computer
Home.Timeline.Content.14.Description: Starting with an interest in videogame modding, I saw programming as the way to bring my most desirable visions into existence. Driven with enthusiasm, I decided to dedicate myself to learning Lua's rudimentary.
Home.Timeline.Content.17.1.Description: Arguably, one of my best purchases. I still remember spending the whole night just waiting for Windows to install.
Home.Timeline.Content.17.2: Experimented with embedded microcontrollers and C/C++
Home.Timeline.Content.17.2.Description: Single-handedly, one of the most significant decisions of my career. Through countless short-circuit and over-voltage MCUs, I've learned to appreciate the engineers behind every piece of electronic.
Home.Timeline.Content.17.3.Description: With the basic understanding of C/C++ through Arduino, the ESP-IDF's (Espressif's IoT Development Framework) eco-system was my next leap forward.
Home.Timeline.Content.18.1: Learned the basic technologies of Web 2.0 (static HTML and CSS)
Home.Timeline.Content.18.2: Utilized a combination of PHP and jQuery to dynamically update my weather forecast
Home.Timeline.Content.18.3: Created simple RESTful APIs to interact with MariaDB databases
Home.Timeline.Content.18.4: Understood the fundamental of salting and hashing user credentials
Home.Timeline.Content.19: Discovered the world of Node.js and JavaScript frameworks
Home.Timeline.Content.19.Description: Eager to improve my application's productivity, speed, and scalability, I was recommended by many to try out Node.js and the diverse world of JavaScript frameworks.
Home.Timeline.Content.20.1.Description: With the spike in PWAs' (Progressive Web Applications) popularity and the abundance of free time during COVID-19, I figured that React and React Native were the most logical next steps.
Home.Timeline.Content.20.2.Description: Fascinated by Next.js server-side render pages and their robustness, I was eager to learn more and equip them in my toolbox.
Home.Timeline.Content.21.1: Start the Bachelor's Programme in International Business and MSc (Econ) at Aalto University
Home.Timeline.Content.21.1.Description: Starting a Bachelor's Degree in International Business has given me countless opportunities to develop myself and meet people from different backgrounds, rounding out my shortcomings.
Home.Timeline.Content.21.2.Description: A community for those interested in science, technology, and digital art to meet, spend time together, and work on either personal or collaborative hobbies.
Home.Timeline.Content.22: Started working on building my portfolio
Home.Timeline.Content.22.Description: As spring break began, I thought it might be a great opportunity to look back and reflect upon what I've learned throughout the years.
Home.Hobbies.Title: Things I love most
Home.Hobbies.Content: Music, Learning, Making, and Machine Learning.
